segments.text: Wow, I wasn't expecting to see such a busy kitchen like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, completely zoned in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no clue about the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my attention, there's a boy climbing a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jarâ€”sneaky little guy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unsteady, that's surprising he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, reaching up for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how they're pulling this off without the adult knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, which surprises me against the inside frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is surprisingly chaotic yet mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hide so much action?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is the biggest shock of all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm taken aback by how oblivious everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR
